landingPage.aboutMeText: I am Lukas, 22, and coding is my passion.

contactPage.headline: Contact Me
contactPage.reachOut: Feel free to reach out with any questions, inquiries, or collaboration opportunities. Your feedback is valuable!
contactPage.responding: Thank you for your message. You will receive a confirmation of receipt; otherwise, please try again. Please note that the confirmation might end up in the spam folder.

projectsPage.headline: My Projects (Currently working on, so only Dummies)

projects.webChess: This is a simple chess game implemented in JavaScript. You can create a lobby, share the link with a friend, and play chess against each other directly.
projects.travelBuddy: TravelBuddy is a comprehensive travel companion app developed using JavaScript and React. Plan and manage your trips seamlessly with an intuitive user interface. Share your travel experiences and itinerary with friends. The backend is powered by Spring and Java, with MongoDB serving as the database for efficient data storage and retrieval.
projects.stylesLibrary: Styles-Library is a collection of reusable styles and components for web development. Built with JavaScript, React, and Node.
projects.anotherProject: This is another exciting project with a unique description. Feel free to explore and contribute!

aboutMe.headline: About Me
aboutMe.greeting: Hello, my name is Lukas Pabst, and I am a Software Developer based in Mühlhausen/Thüringen.
aboutMe.work: I am currently employed as a Software Developer at Finanz-Data GmbH in Gotha.
aboutMe.restServiceDevelopment: REST service development with Java and Spring Boot
aboutMe.education: I hold a Bachelor's degree in Business Informatics.
aboutMe.languages: I am fluent in German (native) and proficient in English, both in writing and speaking
aboutMe.hobbies: My hobbies include weightlifting, programming, and reading.
aboutMe.contact: For professional inquiries or to discuss potential collaborations and opportunities, please feel free to contact me via email at lukas.pabst.business@outlook.de or through the provided contact mechanism.
aboutMe.lookingForward: I am looking forward to connecting with you and discussing exciting opportunities!
aboutMe.feedback: Additionally, I welcome any feedback you may have about my website.
